verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are holy (you are holy)
You are mighty (You are mighty)
You are worthy (You are worthy)
Worthy of praise (Worthy of praise)
I will follow (I will follow)
I will listen (I will listen)
I will love You (I will love You)
All of my days (All of my days)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will sing to and worship
The King who is worthy
And I will love and adore Him
And I will bow down before Him (repeat)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
You are Lord of lords, You are King of kings
You are Mighty God, Lord of everything
You're Emmanuel, You're the great I AM
You're my Prince of Peace who is the Lamb
You're the Living God, You're my saving grace
You will reign forever, You are Ancient of Days
You are Alpha, Omega, Beginning and End
You're my Saviour, Messiah, Redeemer and Friend

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: You're my Prince of peace and I will live my life for You
